name: Sweet Cookie Blast FREE
description:
Sweet Cookie is a brand new game brings a new way of match-3 fun in Cookie Star. New candies, New cookie, more divine, more star combinations and challenging game modes brimming with purple sugar soda!
- Sweet Cookie Match 3 is the beautiful and juicy game in Match 3 style. Combine 3 or more objects the same color for WIN and make the lands become cookie paradise!
- Play cookie mania With Your Friends & Family! Join the fun new cookie matching game all your friends are playing!
- Beautiful animation & cute graphic, travel through the colorful lands of cookie clash mania to relax with exciting game-play and amazing level design. Help the people you meet have a cookie star!
- 2016's best new cookie causal game! Play this cool free match-3 cookie game and watch the hours fly by!
